Learn more at dnaromance.com. What You'll Do Maintain and extend our Django / AWS web app and related mobile wrappers Design clean, scalable APIs and database schemas (PostgreSQL) Implement secure payment flows with Stripe Job Requirements What You Bring -In the final year of a Computer Science or Software Engineering degree -Strong Python skills and solid full-stack web experience (Django a must) -Comfort with SQL (PostgreSQL) and AWS services (Elastic Beanstalk, S3, etc.) -Bonus: exposure to Stripe, mobile-wrapper frameworks -Clear communication, self-direction, and a collaborative mindset Citizenship Requirement Canadian & Permanent Residents Only Position Start Date Position End Date September 12, 2022 12:00 AM December 18, 2022 12:00 AM APPLICATION INFORMATION Application Procedure Through UBC Science Co-op Cover Letter Required? Yes Address Cover Letter to Dr. Tim Sexton
